Class.name: EasyCSP.Validator.Validators.Time
Class.Description:

The attribute must convert to a valid internal time.

Parameter.name: message
Parameter.Default: The value must be a valid time.

Method.name: run
Method.Implementation: if $get(value) = "" then return @false itime = iConv(value, "MT") if Status() <> 0 then return @false if oConv(itime, "MCN" ) <> itime then return @false ; * must be some integer return @true
